title: ASKyBlock空岛插件问题
author: Ghost__
txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=435859&highlight=%E7%A9%BA%E5%B2%9B
帖子地址
我丢进插件文件夹重启服务器输入/is然后提示如下
More set up is required before the plugin can start
Edit config.yml Then restart server 
Make sure you set island distance . tf upgrading set it to what it was before
大概意思是需要配置空岛配置文件
然而帖子搬运者没提供任何关于配置的东西 
特此求助。
